name: Defender Sword I
description: A sword crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Sword II
description: A fortified sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Sword
description: A fortified sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Sword III
description: A fortified sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Sword I
description: This Kamura special delivers the essentials—a sharp edge and sturdy shield.

name: Kamura Sword II
description: This Kamura special delivers the essentials—a sharp edge and sturdy shield.

name: Kamura Sword III
description: This Kamura special delivers the essentials—a sharp edge and sturdy shield.

name: Guardian Sword
description: Used by village defenders, this sword & shield fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura Sword IV
description: This Kamura special delivers the essentials—a sharp edge and sturdy shield.

name: Kamura Ninja Sword
description: A glint of shimmering steel cuts through the dark, trailing an impeccable edge.

name: Kamura Warrior Sword+
description: A glint of shimmering steel cuts through the dark, trailing an impeccable edge.

name: Fine Kamura Sword
description: Filled with hope and vitality for a village hero, this blade never loses its shine.

name: Duke's Baselard
description: A sword carried by a noble family of the Kingdom. Its adorned with engravings of their lineage.

name: Bloodlust Blade
description: Once unsheathed, the red pulse of this blade fills the wielder with a lust for blood.

name: Hidden Edge I
description: An ebon sword, black as ink. Its strange texture is said to conceal bloodstains.

name: Hidden Edge II
description: An ebon sword, black as ink. Its strange texture is said to conceal bloodstains.

name: Kamura Warrior Sword
description: A glint of shimmering steel cuts through the dark, trailing an impeccable edge.

name: Flash in the Night
description: Upgrade of the Hidden Edge. A timelessly fine blade for dirty work.

name: Nightbloom+
description: A blade as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are tormented by hatred.

name: Nightbloom
description: A blade as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are tormented by hatred.

name: Avidya Edge
description: A weapon forged by ancient assassins. Its dark blade grants an instant, painless death.

name: Hana no Nagoriwo I
description: Elegant fans carried by samurai with unbreakable loyalty to their lords.

name: Hana no Nagoriwo II
description: Elegant fans carried by samurai with unbreakable loyalty to their lords.

name: Kurenawi Ougi
description: Any and all life scatters to the wind with the Hana no Nagoriwo's upgrade.

name: Kurenawi Ougi+
description: Any and all life scatters to the wind with the Hana no Nagoriwo's upgrade.

name: Kurenawi Kunpuu
description: May your love not be lost, like cherry blossoms in the wind. I wish upon you peace eternal.

name: Kurenawi Kunpuu+
description: May your love not be lost, like cherry blossoms in the wind. I wish upon you peace eternal.

name: Exorcising Sword I
description: The shield has a Bishaten tail core; the sword is said to be able to dispel evil.

name: Exorcising Sword II
description: The shield has a Bishaten tail core; the sword is said to be able to dispel evil.

name: Crown of the Protector
description: This sword and shield pair will serve a noble guardian who is true of heart.

name: Crown of the Protector+
description: This sword and shield pair will serve a noble guardian who is true of heart.

name: Shaucha Pureblade
description: This sword and shield pair will serve a noble guardian who is true of heart.

name: Shaucha Gloryblade+
description: A sword & shield that severs evil and repels it. Its strikes resemble falling autumn leaves.

name: Shaucha Gloryblade
description: A sword & shield that severs evil and repels it. Its strikes resemble falling autumn leaves.

name: Shaucha Divine Gloryblade
description: Sword & shield of the Great Tengu of myth. The blade is still warm with holy fire.

name: Usurper's Firebolt I
description: A sword filled with the life force of a king. It strikes as lightning falls.

name: Usurper's Firebolt II
description: A sword filled with the life force of a king. It strikes as lightning falls.

name: Despot's Crookbolt
description: Upgrade of the Usurper's Firebolt. Fries foes to a fine, toasty crisp.

name: Despot's Crookbolt+
description: Upgrade of the Usurper's Firebolt. Fries foes to a fine, toasty crisp.

name: Oppressor's Bounty
description: One who would unite all that've fallen from heaven. The wake of its thunderbolt is seen worldwide.

name: Dirty Baron I
description: The poison-injecting blade and inflatable shield combo is a mechanical marvel!

name: Dirty Baron II
description: The poison-injecting blade and inflatable shield combo is a mechanical marvel!

name: Dirty Marquis
description: Now even more marvelous! For those times when you need extra puffed-up poison power.

name: Dirty Marquis+
description: Now even more marvelous! For those times when you need extra puffed-up poison power.

name: Dirty Graf
description: The evolution continues. The shield deploys gas and sword poison to incapacitate foes.

name: Royal Claw I
description: A sword made from Ludroth materials. Its sprays of water mesmerize monsters.

name: Royal Claw II
description: A sword made from Ludroth materials. Its sprays of water mesmerize monsters.

name: Royal Ludroth Claw
description: Upgrade of the Royal Claw. Has a blade clad in a distinct watery film.

name: Royal Ludroth Claw+
description: Upgrade of the Royal Claw. Has a blade clad in a distinct watery film.

name: Royal Waterclaw
description: A one-handed sword engraved with the symbol of a Royal Ludroth. Its power over earth swallows all.

name: Royal Waterclaw+
description: A one-handed sword engraved with the symbol of a Royal Ludroth. Its power over earth swallows all.

name: Golm Sword
description: A broad and unwieldy sword that can produce powerful slashes when used correctly.

name: Giant's Sword "Goltsneit"
description: A sword forged to protect the king. Its righteous spirit refuses to be used for evil deeds.

name: Rex Talon I
description: Modeled after a Tigrex claw. One swing pulverizes the enemy with an enormous roar.

name: Golm Sword+
description: A broad and unwieldy sword that can produce powerful slashes when used correctly.

name: Tigrex Sword
description: Upgrade of Rex Talon. Able to seize souls of pitiful foes in one fell swoop.

name: Tigrex Sword+
description: Upgrade of Rex Talon. Able to seize souls of pitiful foes in one fell swoop.

name: Rex Talon II
description: Modeled after a Tigrex claw. One swing pulverizes the enemy with an enormous roar.

name: Great Tigrex Sword
description: A one-handed sword that radiates a primitive power. The blade is capable of cleaving rock.

name: Great Tigrex Sword+
description: A one-handed sword that radiates a primitive power. The blade is capable of cleaving rock.

name: Frost Edge I
description: Made from ice prisms that have crystallized over ages and will never melt.

name: Frost Edge II
description: Made from ice prisms that have crystallized over ages and will never melt.

name: Hi Frost Edge
description: Upgrade of the Frost Edge. The crystals accentuate its sublime, eternal beauty.

name: Crystallized Edge
description: Upgrade of the Frost Edge. The crystals accentuate its sublime, eternal beauty.

name: Permafrost Edge
description: Crystal polished like a jewel. A beautiful one-handed ice sword requiring great skill to master.

name: Crystallized Edge+
description: Upgrade of the Frost Edge. The crystals accentuate its sublime, eternal beauty.

name: Frostmoon Hatchet
description: A Lunagaron ice-bladed hatchet paired with a shield adorned with a crimson fang for gouging flesh.

name: Frostmoon Hatchet+
description: A Lunagaron ice-bladed hatchet paired with a shield adorned with a crimson fang for gouging flesh.

name: Winter's Feast Hatchet
description: A hatchet capable of vicious savagery. Bloodthirsty, it brutally cleaves flesh from bone.

name: Hunter's Knife II
description: A simple, yet functional sword & shield beloved by Hunters for ages.

name: Hunter's Knife I
description: A simple, yet functional sword & shield beloved by Hunters for ages.

name: Fighter Sword
description: This upgraded Hunter's Knife looks the same, but has never cut better.

name: Iron Beater I
description: Iron sword made by a budding young craftsman. Could use some refining, but it works.

name: Iron Beater II
description: Iron sword made by a budding young craftsman. Could use some refining, but it works.

name: Smithy's Pride
description: The young craftsman seems to have bloomed into an expert! This blade is amazing!

name: Sarganas Rapier
description: Rain hell upon your enemies with this sword and shield made from Astalos materials.

name: Sarganas Rapier+
description: Rain hell upon your enemies with this sword and shield made from Astalos materials.

name: Astalos Rapier
description: The wyvern of rebellion rages through a storm, hungry, pushing forward on instinct alone...

name: Soldier's Dagger I
description: A light sword crafted from Jaggi materials. Easy to use and widely available.

name: Soldier's Dagger II
description: A light sword crafted from Jaggi materials. Easy to use and widely available.

name: Commander's Dagger
description: This upgraded Soldier's Dagger strikes hard and fast, a lot like a Jaggi.

name: Commander's Dagger+
description: This upgraded Soldier's Dagger strikes hard and fast, a lot like a Jaggi.

name: Odyssey Blade I
description: Single bladed short sword imbued with the power of water to wash away blood.

name: Elite Dagger
description: A sword with enhanced performance. Repeated attacks by this blade can inflict fatal wounds.

name: Odyssey Blade II
description: Single bladed short sword imbued with the power of water to wash away blood.

name: Master Odyssey
description: An Odyssey Blade upgrade. No matter the attack, its blade never truly dulls.

name: Oresteia
description: This jade encrusted translucent blade is imbued with the force of a mighty river.

name: Oresteia+
description: This jade encrusted translucent blade is imbued with the force of a mighty river.

name: Agamemnon
description: Though fleeting they may be, let the ripples gather on this blade, gush forth, and wash away all.

name: Pukei Sword I
description: Venom oozes from this sword and shield—your prey will be hesitant to touch either.

name: Pukei Sword II
description: Venom oozes from this sword and shield—your prey will be hesitant to touch either.

name: Venomedge+
description: Upgrade of the Pukei Sword. Its venom eats away at the prey's life force.

name: Venomedge
description: Upgrade of the Pukei Sword. Its venom eats away at the prey's life force.

name: Datura Splitter+
description: A one-handed sword infused with venom. A single swing can be fatal if the blade finds its mark.

name: Datura Splitter
description: A one-handed sword infused with venom. A single swing can be fatal if the blade finds its mark.

name: Djinn I
description: A sword with a red-hot blade wrapped in the scorching flames of a wyvern.

name: Djinn II
description: A sword with a red-hot blade wrapped in the scorching flames of a wyvern.

name: Blazing Falchion+
description: Upgraded form of the Djinn, made from incendiary materials. As hot as magma.

name: Icicle Spike II
description: A Sword of extreme cold. Its blade can pierce shells to freeze prey from within.

name: Nardebosche
description: Upgrade of Icicle Spike. A platinum sword, Barioth's avatar, silences the earth.

name: Nardeglacon
description: A Nardebosche upgrade. A platinum sword, Barioth's avatar, silences the earth.

name: Icicle Spike I
description: A Sword of extreme cold. Its blade can pierce shells to freeze prey from within.

name: Nardeglacon+
description: A Nardebosche upgrade. A platinum sword, Barioth's avatar, silences the earth.

name: Never Event
description: Dazzling white as snow, this blade slices all in its path with supersonic speed.

name: Enspirited Ifrit
description: The king of wyverns soars majestically, casting judgement on those who dwell below.

name: Cunning Riposte I
description: This blade is always sparkly clean thanks to the fresh water coming from its tank.

name: Cunning Riposte II
description: This blade is always sparkly clean thanks to the fresh water coming from its tank.

name: Guard Breaker
description: This blade emanates the fury of a warrior going to battle and glows with pride.

name: Guard Breaker+
description: This blade emanates the fury of a warrior going to battle and glows with pride.

name: True Guard Breaker+
description: A refined weapon, allowing a skilled wielder to weaken and pick off foes with ease.

name: Khezu Razor II
description: A sword & shield made of Khezu parts, designed only to inflict lots of pain.

name: True Guard Breaker
description: A refined weapon, allowing a skilled wielder to weaken and pick off foes with ease.

name: Khezu Razor I
description: A sword & shield made of Khezu parts, designed only to inflict lots of pain.

name: Painful Razor
description: A Khezu Razor upgrade. Cuts too deeply for victims to suppress their screams.

name: Painful Razor+
description: A Khezu Razor upgrade. Cuts too deeply for victims to suppress their screams.

name: Dread Razor
description: A maddening blade that plunges souls into darkness without a sound—not even screams.

name: Dread Razor+
description: A maddening blade that plunges souls into darkness without a sound—not even screams.

name: Hypnos Knife I
description: Baggi parts give this fleet blade a tiring touch. Cures insomnia too!

name: Hypnos Knife II
description: Baggi parts give this fleet blade a tiring touch. Cures insomnia too!

name: Morpheus Knife+
description: Lures prey into the grips of lethargy. Their slumber is broken by a world of pain.

name: Morpheus Knife
description: Lures prey into the grips of lethargy. Their slumber is broken by a world of pain.

name: Bone Kukri I
description: A simple and dependable bone sword that's perfect for budding hunters.

name: Karmanight
description: With one stroke, victims are cut from consciousness to fall into the eternal dark.

name: Bone Kukri II
description: A simple and dependable bone sword that's perfect for budding hunters.

name: Chief Kukri
description: Upgrade of the Bone Kukri. Not only is it solid, it makes gathering easy.

name: Bone Barong I
description: Exudes a rugged boniness due to its source materials. It doesn't cut—it smashes!

name: Bone Barong II
description: Exudes a rugged boniness due to its source materials. It doesn't cut—it smashes!

name: Grand Barong
description: Has a rough look, but don't be fooled—this bony blade's curve is made for hunting.

name: Grand Barong+
description: Has a rough look, but don't be fooled—this bony blade's curve is made for hunting.

name: Dual Carapace
description: Sword made from two varieties of shell, with a strong water element solution coating.

name: Barong Kutot+
description: A sword carved from bone. Its unique form and weight allow it to crush even stone.

name: Dual Carapace+
description: Sword made from two varieties of shell, with a strong water element solution coating.

name: Barong Kutot
description: A sword carved from bone. Its unique form and weight allow it to crush even stone.

name: Princess Rapier I
description: The latest entry in the poison sword line. Reassuringly efficient.

name: Princess Rapier II
description: The latest entry in the poison sword line. Reassuringly efficient.

name: Queen Rapier
description: A Princess Rapier upgrade. Those struck by it shalt well know their lowly place.

name: Empress Rapier
description: A sword & shield used in protection of Her Majesty. No mercy is shown to all those who threaten peace.

name: Queen Rapier+
description: A Princess Rapier upgrade. Those struck by it shalt well know their lowly place.

name: Empress Rapier+
description: A sword & shield used in protection of Her Majesty. No mercy is shown to all those who threaten peace.

description: A vermilion Espinas blade. Its stunning beauty conceals its deadly poison.

name: Rosenmesser+
description: A vermilion Espinas blade. Its stunning beauty conceals its deadly poison.

name: Rosengedien
description: This beautiful, but dangerous crimson blade contains the fire of inferno itself.

name: Bone Tabar I
description: A small, portable axe designed to be used in a continuous hacking motion.

name: Ragdos Tabar
description: A nice, hard swing goes a long way with this upgrade of the Bone Tabar.

name: Bone Tabar II
description: A small, portable axe designed to be used in a continuous hacking motion.

name: Ragdos Tabar+
description: A nice, hard swing goes a long way with this upgrade of the Bone Tabar.

name: Bonebreaker Tabar
description: Fine materials thrown slipshod into a sword and shield to brute force your way through hunts.

name: Naab Sword+
description: A sword created from Seregios scales, its spiked blade penetrates deep into flesh.

name: Feral Fangs
description: Those that wield this enhanced Naab Sword lead revolutions to victory.

name: Bonebreaker Tabar+
description: Fine materials thrown slipshod into a sword and shield to brute force your way through hunts.

name: Carapace Mace I
description: A grim, cudgel-like sword made from a Barroth's shell. It can shatter bone.

name: Carapace Mace II
description: A grim, cudgel-like sword made from a Barroth's shell. It can shatter bone.

name: Barrotherang+
description: Upgrade of the Barroth Club. Its raw power surpasses what should be possible.

name: Barroth Club
description: Upgrade of the Carapace Mace. Its raw power surpasses what should be possible.

name: Studded Club II
description: Weapon made of hard Diablos horn and studded with fangs. High attack power.

name: Pneumatic Drillblade
description: With unparalleled weight, prey is crushed and the ground beneath suffers, too.

name: Spiked Bat
description: Strength and toughness meld together perfectly in this inimitable set.

name: Spiked Bat+
description: Strength and toughness meld together perfectly in this inimitable set.

name: Barbarian Terror
description: A sturdy club adorned with countless horns. Tyrannically crushes its prey at will.

name: Barbarian Terror+
description: A sturdy club adorned with countless horns. Tyrannically crushes its prey at will.

name: Brash Buddies I
description: Mix a Bullfango tusk with a Rhenoplos Shell and you get quite the dynamic duo.

name: Cocky Comrades
description: The Brash Buddies's upgrade employs a blade that's most tempestuous.

name: Flammensucher I
description: An Anjanath blade that pulses with heat with every bloodthirsty strike.

name: Flammensucher II
description: An Anjanath blade that pulses with heat with every bloodthirsty strike.

name: Gnashing Flammensucher
description: It is unclear whether the crimson that wreaths this blade is flame or bloodlust.

description: Mix a Bullfango tusk with a Rhenoplos Shell and you get quite the dynamic duo.

name: Gnashing Flammensucher+
description: It is unclear whether the crimson that wreaths this blade is flame or bloodlust.

description: A blade forged in the inferno of an Anjanath. Its temperature increases when bathed in blood.

name: Lohensieger+
description: A blade forged in the inferno of an Anjanath. Its temperature increases when bathed in blood.

name: Mincing Blade II
description: Goss Harag blade that looks like a kitchen knife. Dinner time—your prey's the dinner!

name: Mincing Blade I
description: Goss Harag blade that looks like a kitchen knife. Dinner time—your prey's the dinner!

name: Chef's Knife
description: This Goss blade is on a new level. Now cuts through monsters in a single swing!

description: This Goss blade is on a new level. Now cuts through monsters in a single swing!

name: Chef's Best Knife+
description: This Goss blade is on a new level. Now cuts through monsters in a single swing!

name: Izuchi Sickle I
description: Blade made of Izuchi tail. It's surprisingly easy to use once you get used to it.

name: Izuchi Sickle II
description: Blade made of Izuchi tail. It's surprisingly easy to use once you get used to it.

name: Chef's Ultimate Knife
description: This Goss blade is now the best in the kitchen! The only knife you'll ever need!

name: Snapper Sickle
description: This honed sickle blade allows you to cut so fast, you'll be a blade whirlwind!

name: Snapper Sickle+
description: This honed sickle blade allows you to cut so fast, you'll be a blade whirlwind!

name: Blower's Scythes
description: Bedecked in carefully selected pelt. Its white fur flutters as you run through the hunting grounds.

description: Resembling the Uroktor, the beak-shaped blade unleashes fiery strikes.

name: Lava Pick II
description: Resembling the Uroktor, the beak-shaped blade unleashes fiery strikes.

description: Upgrade of the Lava Pick. The Uroktor's soul surges red hot within.

description: Upgrade of the Lava Pick. The Uroktor's soul surges red hot within.

name: Bruising Beak
description: The heat from this blade can sear through any defense. Also known as "The Gates of Hell".

name: Secta Nulo I
description: A sword carved from Bnahabra parts. Its feather pattern is both stylish and sharp.

name: Secta Unu
description: This Secta Nulo upgrade is plenty sharp, both literally and figuratively.

name: Secta Nulo White I
description: A sword carved from Bnahabra parts. Its pale blade lets off a creeping chill.

name: Secta Unu White
description: Swings from this Bnahabra blade freeze the air and send prey to an icy tomb.

description: Swings from this Bnahabra blade freeze the air and send prey to an icy tomb.

name: Secta Tre White
description: Swings from this Bnahabra blade freeze the air and send prey to an icy tomb.

name: Secta Nulo Black II

description: Inky blade that blends into the dark. Can even plunge mighty dragons into despair.

name: Secta Du Black
description: Inky blade that blends into the dark. Can even plunge mighty dragons into despair.

name: Secta Nulo Green I
description: A sword carved from Bnahabra parts. Its emerald blade can paralyze and impair foes.

name: Secta Unu Green
description: Upgrade of Secta Nulo Green. Its emerald blade robs its prey of its senses.

name: Secta Du Green
description: Upgrade of Secta Nulo Green. Its emerald blade robs its prey of its senses.

name: Secta Tre Black
description: Inky blade that blends into the dark. Can even plunge mighty dragons into despair.

name: Secta Nulo Yellow I
description: A sword carved from Bnahabra parts. Sparks yellow with static electricity.

name: Secta Tre Green
description: An Upgrade of the Secta Du Green. Its emerald blade robs its prey of its senses.

name: Secta Du Yellow
description: Glimmers gold with immense power. This blade knows not compassion, only slaughter.

name: Secta Tre Yellow
description: Glimmers gold with immense power. This blade knows not compassion, only slaughter.

name: Secta Nulo Red I
description: A blade made from Bnahabra parts that flickers with a brilliant rouge hue.

description: A blade made from Bnahabra parts that flickers with a brilliant rouge hue.

name: Secta Unu Red

description: Upgrade of Secta Unu Red. Flames dance in the wake of its every swing.

name: Secta Tre Red
description: An upgrade of the Secta Du Red. Flames dance in the wake of its every swing.

name: Sinister Sword I
description: A thing of infinite hunger, this sword's all-devouring void only grows as it eats.

description: Glimmers gold with immense power. This blade knows not compassion, only slaughter.

name: Sinister Sword II
description: A thing of infinite hunger, this sword's all-devouring void only grows as it eats.

name: Sinister Shadekeeper
description: This blade's bloodlust is perpetual, as is the unrest of its victims' souls.

name: Sinister Shadekeeper+
description: This blade's bloodlust is perpetual, as is the unrest of its victims' souls.

name: Tormented Shadekeeper
description: An unfulfilled soul sharpens this bloodthirsty blade. It can only be quenched by the blood of a dragon.

name: Spirit Stealer
description: A dragon's soul carved a new inscription into the blade, emitting a flickering azure flame.

name: Sucher-Ankh
description: A black Sword incredibly heavy for its size. Its eye is a window to hell.

name: Sucher-Ankh+
description: A black Sword incredibly heavy for its size. Its eye is a window to hell.

name: Sieger-Ankh
description: The cursed eye on this jet-black blade compels one to fling themselves into the abyss.

name: Le Détecteur
description: An incredibly light dagger. With its iridescent Shield, it makes mighty heroes.

name: Le Limier
description: This golden sword of truth is the centerpiece of spectral sword dances.

name: Rajang Club I
description: A club-like sword made to release thunder. When danger lurks, thunder strikes.

name: Banned Rajang Club
description: Upgrade of the Rajang Club. Inspires ceaseless rage inside the wielder.

name: Rajang Club II
description: A club-like sword made to release thunder. When danger lurks, thunder strikes.

name: Banned Rajang Club+
description: Upgrade of the Rajang Club. Inspires ceaseless rage inside the wielder.

name: Cursed Rajang Club
description: The ultimate form of the Rajang Club, waiting to quash evil like a bolt from the heavens.

name: Demonlord Bludgeon
description: A devilish-looking sword & shield for those already on the warpath.

name: Azure Elder Sword II
description: A sword imbued with Ibushi's swiftness; a shield with the wind's flexibility.

name: Azure Elder Sword I
description: A sword imbued with Ibushi's swiftness; a shield with the wind's flexibility.

name: Thunderbolt Sword I
description: Dual blades, magnificent in their grandeur—the incarnation of Narwa.

name: Windchaser
description: Born from darkness, the blade never ceases the relentless search for its next victim.

name: Abyssal Storm Shredder
description: The Thunder Serpent's blade. A peerless sword that only admits a hero to wield it.

name: Atomic Mind
description: Banished from nirvana, the blade never ceases the relentless search for its next victim.

name: Icesteel Dagger I
description: Sword & shield holding the power of Daora. Used by the icy kings of northern lands.

name: Daora's Razor
description: An Icesteel Dagger upgrade. Capable of blizzard-like strikes with every swing.

name: Daora's Maelstrom
description: An ice sword that can summon a blizzard, sending ripping winds to chase down foes.

name: Daora's Razor+
description: An Icesteel Dagger upgrade. Capable of blizzard-like strikes with every swing.

name: Teostra's Emblem
description: The shield of this Teostra's Spada upgrade bears the head of a proud beast.

name: Teostra's Spada I
description: The Flame Emperor's burning sigil. At the beast king's behest, the inferno yawns.

name: Teostra's Emblem+
description: The shield of this Teostra's Spada upgrade bears the head of a proud beast.

name: Teostra's Medal
description: Only the strongest are permitted to wield this symbol of the empire. Its majesty is unending.

name: Redwing Swiftblade I
description: Use of Valstrax parts grants this blade the swiftness of a shooting star.

name: Vermilion Orgul
description: A sword birthed by the crimson eclipse. Its blade can cut through all.

name: Gates of Heaven
description: A sword birthed by the crimson eclipse. Its blade can cut through all.

name: Abyssal Sunburst
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The third was a sun to dry even the sea.

name: Sleepy Shellsword II
description: Sword made out of a shell. You can hear the calming sounds of the ocean from it.

name: Waking Nightmare+
description: This conch-crafted blade can cut through towering waves, or lull prey to sleep.

name: Waking Nightmare
description: This conch-crafted blade can cut through towering waves, or lull prey to sleep.

name: Dreamwaver
description: Enhanced with carefully-selected materials. This sword's magical glow will lull you to a deep sleep.

name: Sleepy Shellsword I
description: Sword made out of a shell. You can hear the calming sounds of the ocean from it.

name: Catspaw I
description: A Melynx's beloved thieving tool. Gather stamps and buy from a Lynian.

name: Catspaw II
description: A Melynx's beloved thieving tool. Gather stamps and buy from a Lynian.

name: Catburglar
